columns.tv_show_ID: The unique identifier for each TV show.
columns.tv_show_name: The title of the TV show.
columns.Sub_tittle: The supplementary title for the TV show.
columns.Next_show_name: The title of the subsequent TV show.
columns.Original_Airdate: The date when the TV show first aired.

tv_show.table_description: The table stores information about various TV shows and their details.

columns.City_channel_ID: The unique identifier for each city channel.
columns.Radio_ID: The unique identifier for each radio station.
columns.Is_online: The status indicating if the radio station is online.

city_channel_radio.table_description: The table links city channels with radio stations and their online status.

columns.City_channel_ID: The unique identifier for each city channel.
columns.tv_show_ID: The unique identifier for each TV show.
columns.Is_online: The status indicating if the TV show is available online.
columns.Is_free: The status indicating if the TV show is free to watch.

city_channel_tv_show.table_description: The table links city channels with TV shows and their availability statuses.

columns.Radio_ID: The unique identifier for each radio station.
columns.Transmitter: The name of the location for the radio transmitter.
columns.Radio_MHz: The frequency of the radio station in MHz.
columns.2FM_MHz: The frequency for the 2FM channel in MHz.
columns.RnaG_MHz: The frequency for the RnaG channel in MHz.
columns.Lyric_FM_MHz: The frequency for the Lyric FM channel in MHz.
columns.ERP_kW: The effective radiated power of the radio station in kilowatts.

radio.table_description: The table stores details about various radio stations and their frequencies.

columns.ID: The unique identifier for each city channel.
columns.City: The name of the city where the channel is located.
columns.Station_name: The official name of the city channel.
columns.Owned_Since: The year when the channel started operating.
columns.Affiliation: The broadcasting network the channel is affiliated with.

city_channel.table_description: The table provides information about various city channels and their details.
